Description: Fantastic and spacious 3 bedroom apartment for rent in the heart of Southie! This apartment comes with in-unit laundry, a huge private backyard and deck, a large kitchen & family room and three bedrooms with great closet space. Close to broadway street with restaurants, coffee and shopping as well as easy commuting into the city! The perfect Southie rental! Lease start on 9/1. You don't want to miss out!
